|}https://www.worlddata.info/africa/mauritius/index.php.:
Mauritius’s Monotheism Religiously Studies: Is Diverse with No majority Religion Winning 1st#. Spot in sight: Majority of the population are: Christianity:(45.67%) Multi-Christian’s Included “Roman Catholics” & “Protestant” Church’s; followed by ISLAM&Muslims: “Islamic Faith” (45.67%.); and “Hindus”:(4.5%):Judaism(1.3%).and Others (3.95%).:
.
https://worldpopulationreview.com/countries/mauritius.:.
